name: (WIP) Quinn & Flynn
description:
WIP - Check back in a few days

Semi-linear gay romance/mystery VN. Catch a criminal while pursuing a poet. You will get both of them. You have to.

Mouse click or enter/spacebar to progress. Click dialogue options or press 1/2/3 to choose them.

Demo for Yaoi Game Jam 2022 and full game for Narrative Driven Jam 9. Warm feelings (love, anger, and sweat; mostly sweat) and puzzle (mystery).
